transcript.title: UNKNOWN
transcript.content:
11 MAY 1988
His Majesty King Juan Carlos I of Spain and Her Majesty Queen
Sofia will pay a State visit to Australia from 13 to 19 June.
They will be accompanied by their elder daughter Her Royal
Highness the Infanta Elena.
Their Majesties will visit Brisbane, Canberra and Sydney. In
Brisbane they will be guests of honour at the Spanish National
Day at Expo 88 on 14 June.
The visit will add a further dimension to the relationship
between Australia and Spain, characterised as it is by growing
economic links and shared democratic ideals. 006376
FOR MEDIA SAUSTRALIA
